data.text: @iheartruthie Hi Ruth. You can bring a laptop bag on top of your carry-on.
@natecabigao You're welcome. See you onboard!
@natecabigao Hi Nate. You can include this in your carry-on.
@SmileLiiizzzy You're welcome!
@keme_root Hi! We sent you a DM. Kindly check.
@SmileLiiizzzy This is noted. For your prepaid baggage, you can bring more than 1 bag as long as the total weight will not exceed 20kg.
@heizerunutto Hi Hazel. If the passenger has not received a booster shot yet, she needs to present a negative COVID-19 test result prior to flight departure.
@iheartmarcie Our @PALMabuhayMiles team is in the best position to assist you on this, Marcie.

@iheartmarcie However, please note that entry restrictions and requirements are constantly evolving. Thus, we highly suggest to check this with the concerned travel authority in your origin and destination as well. Thank you!

(2/2)

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @SmileLiiizzzy Hi, Less. May we know the flight route for this? Thank you.

urls.title: Sports equipment
urls.description: A special service offered by Philippine Airlines (PAL) on Domestic flights, allowing passengers to avail of additional sports baggage on top of their free baggage allowance and prepaid baggage up to 4-hours before estimated time of departure. Dimensions: Regardless of the actual dimension, it will be considered as a piece of baggage equivalent to 62 inches (158cms). Set: Consist of one pair of snow skis, one pair of ski poles and one pair of ski boots. Any sets of snow ski equipment in excess of one will

data.text: @PedroPedz91 Hi, Pedro. We believe listening to our passengers is the best way for us to learn and improve our services. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.
@juanderhixxy We have sent you a DM, John. Thank you.
@denbyperezz Hi, Denby. We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you regarding your concern? Thank you.
@hellojohnsource Hello, John. We have sent a DM to assist you with your concern. Thank you.

@juanderhixxy Hi, John. We're sorry for the delay on your refund. We're trying to send you a DM for us to ask for your booking / refund details, however we're unable to. Kindly make sure the feature is enabled on your profile.
@jrong13 Hi, JR! We have your feedback noted. We'll inform our handling team for service enhancements. Thank you!

@SanLeandroRep Hi, San. We’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website. May we suggest to refresh, clear your browser's cache, use an incognito tab or try using a different device or browser? Thank you.
@girlydevs Hi, Rosy. We have responded to your dm.

data.text:
@jon_canete Apologies, Jon. You may also refer to this link for the list of DOH- accredited labs here: https://t.co/d4XbkH7CJc

You may check the travel rules here:  

https://t.co/wIpRYZI4cn

Thank you!
@jon_canete (2/2) Please note that the travel requirements are constantly changing and evolving. Kindly also check with the local/international unit for the latest travel update. Thank you.
@AnnJeme You're welcome, Jeme Ann! If you’ve got other inquiries, just message us here. :)

@mp092201 Hi, MP. You may check the travel requirements of your destination at this link: 

https://t.co/h2FHUdP7Hm

@3lpresident3 Regarding your cancelled flight, we've noted that your reported experience was already forwarded to the concerned office for their attention and service enhancement. Again, we apologize for the inconvenience that the said disruption has caused.

(3/3)

@3lpresident3 We affirm that safety is our top priority and that Philippine Airlines is fully cooperating with the concerned airport and aviation authorities.

(2/n)
@IamShanepaul Hi, SP. We're sorry for the inconvenience. May we confirm if your flight is within 24 hours?
@iztir Hi, Ritzeeeyyy. We're truly sorry to hear this. We'll send you a dm so we can ask for your details and we'll share your feedback to the concerned office.

@danawho9891 However, please note that entry restrictions and requirements are constantly evolving. Thus, we highly suggest to check this with the concerned travel authority in your origin and destination as well.

@danawho9891 Effective September 7, 2022, travelers with a valid vaccination certificate (should be in English or Japanese, issued by the Philippine Government and should indicate 3 doses) will be allowed to board even without the Negative COVID19 Test.
